sentences.sContent: efforts to regenerate the US economy
The Marshall Plan sought to regenerate the shattered Europe of 1947.
sentences.sCn: 马歇尔计划试图重建1947年千疮百孔的欧洲。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + generate(产生) → 重新产生 → (使)再生

words.tran: [生物][化学][物] 再生，重生；重建

trans.tranOther: to make something develop and grow strong again
